title: The 2016 IPCPR Recap Show
itunes:title: The 2016 IPCPR Recap Show
description:
Dave is back from IPCPR and Mr. Jonathan is at a wedding. So Dave, Chuck and Barry break down the 2016 IPCPR Show which has just concluded in Las Vegas, Nevada.

In the first hour we will smoke C.O. Jones which was part of TCA Care Package. In the second hour, the boys will dig into the samples received at the show and light up something new…

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority
